title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the fallout from Baker Mayfield getting trade to the Panthers and what other young QBs in the league can learn from this. He believes the Warriors have no interest in bringing back Kevin Durant and why they are better off without the talented 2-time NBA champion. He tells you why he was right about Kyrie Irving and wrong about Derek Carr. Plus, former number 1 overall pick Trevor Lawrence joins the show to talk about the challenges of his rookie season and how to improve this year. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
